#summary Suite of broken PNG images
#labels Featured

== Introduction ==

As a means of increasing test coverage, I started working on suite of images to cover all the possible error cases. It has subsequently also been used to improve the coverage of the excellent [http://www.libpng.org/pub/png/apps/pngcheck.html pngcheck] tool.

The code to generate the images is checked in:
[http://javapng.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/javapng2/src/test/BrokenGenerator.java BrokenGenerator.java]. In general I try to pick a simple image
from [http://www.schaik.com/pngsuite/ PngSuite] and mutate it by swapping chunks, adding in new chunks, etc. Contributions are welcome.

== Download ==

All releases are tagged with the [http://code.google.com/p/javapng/downloads/list?q=label:BrokenSuite BrokenSuite label].
